flyer1.Explanation: {{1}} e harikoa ana ki te panui i te whakarewanga o to maatau paetukutuku hou. Kei roto i te rarangi tipu o nga ahuatanga, penei:
flyer1.Public: Nga korero a te iwi mo {{1}}
flyer1.Private: He pūkete kaiwhakamahi tūmataiti mo ia mema
flyer1.Notifications: Ma te whakauru i to wahitau imeera me to nama waea ka taea e koe te whiwhi whakamohiotanga nui ma te imeera me te karere kuputuhi.
flyer1.GetStarted: Hei timata, i to kaitirotiro paetukutuku me ata whakauru:
flyer1.IssuedToYou: Ko tenei waehere ka tukuna ki a koe.
